document_data.name: Fellowship of Flight
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellowship of Flight''' was a religious ceremony undergone by all [[airwalker]]s, the [[specialty priest]]s of [[Akadi]], that celebrated their ability to summon an [[air elemental]] upon reaching a certain level of skill.
document_data.Activities: Specialty priests of Akadi, known as [[airwalker]]s, prayed for one solemn hour before performing the ceremony. The air elemental was summoned following the prayer. Upon its arrival, the elemental was wafted with [[incense]], sung to, sprinkled with flowers, and gifted poems of Akadi that it would bring back to the [[Great Funnel]], Akadi's [[divine realm]].
